Utils

Class RmiUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.RmiUtils

  • public class RmiUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines some useful constants and methods for the RMI communications.
    Author:
    Filipe Teixeira , Miguel Azevedo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String arrivalTerminalId
      The id of the Arrival Terminal service.
      static java.lang.String arrivalTerminalTransferZoneId
      The id of the Arrival Terminal Transfer Zone (or Exit) service.
      static java.lang.String baggagePickupZoneId
      The id of the Baggage Pickup Zone service.
      static java.lang.String baggageReclaimGuichetId
      The id of the Baggage Reclaim Guichet service.
      static java.lang.String busId
      The id of the Bus service.
      static java.lang.String departureTerminalEntraceZoneId
      The id of the Departure Terminal Entrance service.
      static java.lang.String genRepId
      The id of the General Repository service.
      private static int maxAttempts
      The maximum number of retries to access the rmi registry.
      static int rmiPort
      The port used for the RMI registry in all terminals.
      static java.lang.String tempStorageId
      The id of the Temporary Baggage Storage service.
      private static int waitTime
      Time to be waited between successive retries to access the rmi registry.

    • Method Detail

      • getRMIReg

        public static java.rmi.registry.Registry getRMIReg(java.lang.String hostname,
                                   java.lang.String usage)
                                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Tries to access the requested rmi registry and, in case of failure, retries [maxAttempts] times.
        Parameters:
        hostname - The name of the terminal that hosts the RMI registry
        usage - The usage string of the service calling this method.
        Returns:
        The requested RMI registry and a NULL in case of failure.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
